name: 2021 International Conference on Telecommunications and Information Engineering
content: For papers submitted to ICTIE 2021, we offer the publication as following: 1\. Publication in IJEETC. Submissions will be peer reviewed by conference committees and IJEETC editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in the International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications, which will be indexed by Scopus, Google Scholar, Crossref, Citefactor.
